IROLL(6D)                                             IROLL(6D)





NAME
       iroll - roll an image in x and y directions

SYNOPSIS
       iroll inimage outimage xroll yroll

DESCRIPTION
       iroll rotationaly rolls an image. The integers xroll and
       yroll specify how many pixels to roll the image in the x
       direction or the y directon.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                 IROLL(6D)
